text: Murderer! What do you think you're doing?
speaker: NPC

option1.text: Liar! I have not laid a hand on you
option1.speaker: Player

option2.text: Stand still so that I won't miss again
option2.speaker: Player

option2a.text: Why would you try to kill me? I have not wronged anyone in my life, I just do some honest work to provide for my family
option2a.speaker: NPC

option2aa.text: I don't know, I just love killin'
option2aa.speaker: Player

option2ab.text: I made a mistake, please we can sort this out
option2ab.speaker: Player

option2ac.text: I just want to steal everything you have
option2ac.speaker: Player

option2b.text: Who made you do this? We can talk this out, please don't kill me
option2b.speaker: NPC

option2ba.text: No one hired me, I just wanted to kill someone, it's not personal
option2ba.speaker: Player

option2bb.text: Ok I made a mistake, I'm sorry, just stop crying
option2bb.speaker: Player

option2c.text: Do you enjoy killing innocent people?
option2c.speaker: NPC

option2cb.text: No, but I'm in a really tough financial situation
option2cb.speaker: Player

option2cc.text: I didn't like the way you looked at me
option2cc.speaker: Player

option3.text: *POINT AT SOMEONE ELSE* Yes! You right there! You think you can try to kill this poor man and nobody will see you?
option3.speaker: Player

option3a.text: No no no, you can't talk your way ot of this
option3a.speaker: NPC

option3aa.text: I have no idea what you're talking about
option3aa.speaker: Player

option3ab.text: Ok, I tried to kill you, I'm sorry, I made a mistake
option3ab.speaker: Player
